tag_professor: Participation matters (4)  Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Get ready to read (1)
stu_tags: GET READY TO READ  PARTICIPATION MATTERS  LOTS OF HOMEWORK
comments: Very strict on attendance and is overall a terrible grader. She expects work almost every day and expects you to read A LOT. 1 Long paper, Midterm and Final and is extremely harsh in general. Would recommend to not take if you are looking for easy A.

tag_professor: Participation matters (4)  Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: Her class is overall great and easy. You get two tests, one midterm and one final. You have quizzes on each chapter (online), its possible to get a 100 on all. You also have one paper, super easy and clear on grading criteria. Only thing I disliked doing group work all the time and using popsicle sticks if no one wants to participate.

tag_professor: Participation matters (4)  Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: Her teaching ways were not for me. She teaches the class like its a high school class. To much group work and always had the class stand up and move around to gather up with new partners. Her tests make no sense, they are basically impossible to study for. She can be rude at times and calls students out if she thinks they aren\'t paying attention.

tag_professor: Participation matters (4)  Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Get ready to read (1)
stu_tags: BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES  PARTICIPATION MATTERS  TOUGH GRADER
comments: Great course!

tag_professor: Participation matters (4)  Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: Quizes online due almost every week& the answers are basically online, should be an easy 100% each time.. theres a blog, she asks a question leaves it open for a week, your participation is what you comment and sometimes if you answer questions in class... one midterm paper and one final research response essay... no tests.. chill and easy class

tag_professor: Participation matters (4)  Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: Professor Isaacson\'s class was challenging but overall she did an amazing job teaching this GER course. The schedule for this course was extremely organized and helpful. You really have to make an effort to do well but it\'s possible if you get everything done on time and participate.

tag_professor: Participation matters (4)  Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: The class was good. Everything was according to schedule. There was 3 test of 5w\'s on vocab words (easy but don\'t underestimate it). There was an essay, presentation, blog post we had to submit after every chapter we read. Prof comes across as intimidating at times. However if u do good work,she is not as bad. Final Grade: A

tag_professor: Participation matters (4)  Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: Sometimes she can come across stern and other times she will seem lighthearted. If have her next semester just remember to read thoroughly through the readings and participate everyday in class. This will engage your mind with the material and the classes will fly by because you are participating. I liked her b/c she was passionate!

tag_professor: Participation matters (4)  Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: She\'s not really that bad of a professor. If you have a genuine intrest for American History, I would recommend her. Her essays are clearly outlined and you can always ask her questions (unless they\'re stupid questions, of course.) Be mindful of your grammar and always do the reading!! She\'s happy as long as people are participating in her class.

tag_professor: Participation matters (4)  Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: Drop the class now before it\'s too late. Good luck getting a good grade if your not a historian, she expects everyone to be well versed on American history, but it is a GER. VERY hard grader, and boring lectures.

tag_professor: Participation matters (4)  Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: Taking her is signing your death sentence ! Too much hw , she\'s virtually never satisfied with works and if you work your hardest you might get a b-

tag_professor: Participation matters (4)  Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: Takes her class way to seriously. Lots of reading to do. Very hard to satisfy her with your essays (and I actually thought I am a great writer...) An A isnt impossible, just prepare to do lots of stuff for her every single class.

tag_professor: Participation matters (4)  Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: Read the assignments. If you are going to fall asleep and not read or participate you can expect a horrible grade. Keep your essays simple and to the point. Don\'t add unnecessary details. Provide evidence and a strong thesis. She doesn\'t play favorites, she\'s fair. Go to class, 3 unexcused absences. Some people make the class sound impossible.

tag_professor: Participation matters (4)  Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: A lot of readings but honestly it is not a hard class. If you don\'t put any effort into your essays she will notice. She is very particular but she does explain what she expects in your papers. A lot of people were angered by her attitude. If you don\'t like that then don\'t ask dumb questions and pay attention. it\'s that simple.

tag_professor: Participation matters (4)  Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: RUN AWAY AS FAST AS YOU CAN!!!! she is never EVER happy with your work. We had to write 3 essays. In the first one she told me that i need to paraphrase more. So on the second one i did..and she said that i plagiarized WHEN I DIDNT. so on the third essay i used quotes and she said that i dont use my own voice enough. SHES NEVER HAPPY.

tag_professor: Participation matters (4)  Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: HORRIBLE!!!!!!! she can get really mean and she gets red if people take too long to answer a question. Very moody and a hard grader. Your essays have to be PERFECT and only written how she wants them no exceptions. I would never take her again. TAKE MY ADVICE AND DO NOT TAKE HER!!!!! and on top of that she has favorites. ughh

tag_professor: Participation matters (4)  Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: I think she can be pretty tough but she is pretty understanding too. She let us revise the midterm exam and the final paper in order to boost up a letter grade. Class needs a lot of reading and she gives points for participation.

tag_professor: Participation matters (4)  Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: the most horrible teacher in my life, does not answers email, very moody, hard grader, I would not recomend her to anyone

tag_professor: Participation matters (4)  Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: She\'s fairly easy with grading homeworks. Its writing-intensive, so she gives you writing assignments. Pretty easy 3/3 homeworks. She grades hard on papers especially when you do not understand Chicago style. Her lectures are okay, sometimes boring. I wouldn\'t recommend her if you\'re not willing to do the homework or readings.

tag_professor: Participation matters (4)  Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: I thought she was great. There were a lot of readings and textbook use, but I also found her lectures to be extremely helpful. It\'s writing-intensive, you\'re obviously going to have to work hard. But I have no idea what other reviewers are talking about- I never found her to be consistently rude or moody. I thought she was fun. I\'d recommend her.
